abstract: Two Baltimore policemen shoot and kill man after he fires upon them, injuring one of the officers.
lead_paragraph: The authorities said the Baltimore police shot and killed a man on Wednesday after he shot one of the officers.

headline.main: Maryland: Man Killed and Officer Shot in Baltimore Confrontation
headline.print_headline: Maryland: Man Killed and Officer Shot in Baltimore Confrontation

snippet: The authorities said the Baltimore police shot and killed a man on Wednesday after he shot one of the officers.
